name: 🌱Carbon Credit🌱Reducers🌱
description:
By purchasing this Carbon Credit NFT you can contribute to save the Amazon rainforest & reduce your CO2 emission. I will compensate for the ecological footprint after every 100 OBJKT purchase by buying real carbon credit equivalent to 1 tonne of CO2 and you can get a copy of the certificate. The validated platform is provided by the world's leading carbon offsetting company. 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Details: Seamless loop rendered by Blender/Eevee 1080x1080/25fps (with my own music) for HEN1000.
